snippet: A former soldier sentenced to life for raping and killing a teenage Iraqi girl and killing her family died at the federal penitentiary in Tucson over the weekend in what officials suspect was a suicide.
abstract: Former soldier Steven Dale Green, who was sentenced to life for raping and killing teenage Iraqi girl and killing her family, dies at federal penitentiary in Tucson, Ariz, in what officials suspect was suicide.
lead_paragraph: A former soldier sentenced to life for raping and killing a teenage Iraqi girl and killing her family died at the federal penitentiary in Tucson over the weekend in what officials suspect was a suicide.

headline.main: Arizona: Ex-Soldier Who Killed Family Is Found Dead
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Ex-Soldier Who Killed Family Is Found Dead
